snippet.title: Dinothawr - First standalone libretro game
snippet.description:
Hans-Kristian Arntzen (Themaister) and Agnes Heyer just designed the first game made specifically from the ground up for the libretro API. It is a Sokoban-style puzzler with cutesy 16bit SNES graphics. The music is composed entirely by Themaister himself as well.

This game will be bundled with RetroArch soon.
